title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Contextual summary support in service-side auto-labeling
description:
,Contextual summary will be supported in simulation mode for service-side auto-labeling. When reviewing matched items in the Contextual Summary tab, youâ€™ll now be able to easily review what sensitive information type was found as a match in the document.
